name: Windows Accessibility Wizard File
summary: Learn about .ACW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Accessibility Wizard can be accessed in Windows XP by selecting Start → All Programs → Accessories → Accessibility → Accessibility Wizard. It can also be started by selecting Start → Run, typing "accwiz," and then clicking "OK."

description: Settings file created by the Accessibility Wizard, a component of Windows XP; saves settings that customize the operating system for different vision, hearing, or mobility needs; may include settings for the magnifier, narrator, on-screen keyboard, and other functions.
